text.p: ANGOSS INTEGRATES Knowledge STUDIO WITH TANDEM DATA MINING SERVER

TORONTO, July 15 - ANGOSS Software Corporation (ASE: ANC), a leading developer of data-mining software, announced a new product today. KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS(TM) will integrate Tandem Computers' Data Mining Server (DMS) with ANGOSS' KnowledgeSTUDIO(TM) suite of knowledge discovery tools. The integrated product will be available to both Tandem Himalaya Server-based DSS users and Windows NT Server users running Tandem's NonStop SQL/MX database. KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS(TM) will improve data mining performance several orders of magnitude. To provide clients a single support source for the integrated product, ANGOSS will be the exclusive marketing and client support channel for KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS(TM).

The advantage of integrating ANGOSS data mining tools with DMS is that clients can analyze larger quantities of data to find correlation and trends. Using ANGOSS KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS(TM), clients will learn more about their business processes, resulting in reduced costs, increased sales, and profit improvement.

Tandem has made aggressive commitments to data mining performance improvement with both DMS and their Object Relational Data Mining initiative,'' said Rod MacLeod, Director of Business Development for ANGOSS. KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS(TM) provides a unique solution for both Tandem Himalaya Server and Windows NT Server users. These customers demand data mining solutions capable of analyzing all their detailed data. The integrated KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS(TM) solution will take full advantage of the Tandem's Scaleable Windows NT or Himalaya Server parallel processing power, and the NonStop SQL/MX database, to accelerate the analytical performance of our client's data mining systems.''

ANGOSS established the industry benchmark for ease of use by business users with its flagship product KnowledgeSEEKER(TM)'' observed Rich Ghiassi, Director, Decision Support Solutions Marketing for Tandem. When used together, DMS and ANGOSS' recently announced KnowledgeSTUDIO(TM), will provide Tandem DSS Clients a quantum performance improvement for mining large databases. ANGOSS usability and Tandem scaleable performance are truly a world class combination.''

KnowledgeSTUDIO(TM) is a suite of client/server solutions for datamining, decision support, and business intelligence. The technology enables users to rapidly analyze and understand the patterns in a data, providing powerful insights for business process analysis and decision support.

Toronto, Ontario-based ANGOSS Software Corporation was founded in 1984. ANGOSS provides a family of client/server solutions for decision support, business intelligence, and data mining. The company has traded on the Alberta Stock Exchange since 1993. ANGOSS has offices or representatives worldwide, including the United States, France, South Africa, Japan, and the United Kingdom.
KnowledgeSEEKER, KnowledgeSTUDIO, and KnowledgeSTUDIO-DMS are ANGOSS trade marks.
